mapper.select: /* 특정 자격증 정보 조회 */ SELECT li.li_code ,li.lsc_code ,li.li_name ,li.li_overview ,li_qualification ,li_reg_id ,li_reg_datetime FROM license_info AS li WHERE li.li_code = #{liCode};
mapper.insert: /* 자격증 정보 등록 */ INSERT INTO license_info ( li_code ,lsc_code ,li_name ,li_overview ,li_qualification ,li_reg_id ,li_reg_datetime) VALUES (#{liCode}, #{lscCode}, #{liName},#{liOverview}, #{liQualification}, #{liRegId}, CURDATE());
